Function to plot either total positive trips (binomial) or total catch/bycatch (all other models)

plotSums.Rd

Function to plot either total positive trips (binomial) or total catch/bycatch (all other models)

Usage

plotSums(
  yearpred,
  modType,
  fileName,
  subtext = "",
  allVarNames,
  startYear,
  common,
  run,
  catchType,
  catchUnit
)

yearpred

Value

modType

Value

fileName

Value

Value

allVarNames

Value

startYear

Value

Value

run

Value
